Kim Kyunyeon

An Da Eun

Introduction

The ADE (Korean: 디에이드; Japanese: ディエイド) is a South Korean duo under their own agency ADE Music (에이드뮤직). They debuted on October 11, 2016, with their first mini album "Reborn".

The duo consists of vocalist An Da Eun (안다은) and guitarist Kim Kyunyeon (김규년). Before they formed The ADE, they were the members of the duo Acoustic Collabo (어쿠스틱 콜라보) from June 2014 until June 2016.
